metadata.title: Canada-MEDS /IOS Sea Level Height Database
metadata.description:
Measurement Details
measurement of sea level (and lake level) heights from various stations in Canada

Geographic Area
Canada; Northeast  Pacific

IOSPBS Data Distribution
Data for BC coastal stations (monthly averages) are available at IOS. (CCS$PHYSICS:[LIGHTHOUSE.ARCHIVE.MONTHLY]). Howard Freeland maintains time series from three stations (BAMFIELD, TOFINO and PRINCE RUPERT).  These data need careful appraisal due to tectonic effects and instrumentation problems.

PSARC_Utility
variations in sea level height have been used as evidence of El Nino conditions and other oceanographic anomalies.

Improvements
Generally in good shape. Some additional file format options might be useful (IOS HEADER format, spreadsheet/CSV format).

Base Internet/URL
http://www.meds.dfo.ca

A TCODE project
